name: SiilyMilly
description:
There are slightly noticeable white stripes on the sides of the screen, move on them when you press the left mouse button to move the camera

Click on the exclamation mark to move to another room.

Hi, for Millie to appear, use the keyboard: Living room - L, 

Kitchen - K, 

Bathroom - H, 

Bedroom - B.

In the kitchen there is a big red button on the wall pressing it will appear an apple.

The main character is made from a video tutorial

All models were made during the Game Jam in Blender.

Disclaimer: All coincidences are random, the author did not want to offend anyone.
